      • getUserExternalRecord

        public ExternalRecord getUserExternalRecord(int userId)
        Description copied from interface: Dataset
        Retrieving external user ID associated with the specified user ID stored in this Dataset. In the case that Dataset is linked to an external database, each user ID in Dataset has different ID in such external database.
        Specified by:
        getUserExternalRecord in interface Dataset
        Overrides:
        getUserExternalRecord in class ScannerImpl
        Parameters:
        userId - specified internal user identifier.
        Returns:
        The external record ExternalRecord that contains the external user ID

      • getItemProfile

        public Profile getItemProfile(int itemId)
        Description copied from interface: Dataset
        Getting Profile of specified item ID. Profile contains associative information of a given subject: user, item, context, etc. For example, Profile of item ID 1 can contains: Computer COM1, CPU Intel, 2GB RAM.
        Specified by:
        getItemProfile in interface Dataset
        Overrides:
